body: At 4th level, an aquatic druid gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against spells of the water type or the exceptional or supernatural abilities of creatures with the aquatic or water subtype. This ability replaces resist nature's lure.
name: Resist Ocean's Fury
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Resist Oceans Fury
